data.text: An extended stay in crew quarters can do wonders for the body.
A welcome reprieve on a long space voyage.
A main junction to access the rest of the ship.

Docked: {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Exit. You may exit the ship through the boarding ramp and move to the docked location. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Repair. You may repair another location on the ship as if you were at that location if the check symbols match.
A main junction to access the rest of the ship.
The only access point to the cockpit.
{Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Repair. You may repair another location on the ship as if you were at that location if the check symbols match.
The only access point to the cockpit.

{Nature/power-lightning} Pilot. Take control of the vessel. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Parley. Communicate with another ship in your quadrant. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Repair. You may repair another location on the ship as if you were at that location if the check symbols match. (You may perform this action while piloting)
The only access point to the cockpit.

{Nature/power-lightning} Pilot. Take control of the vessel. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Parley. Communicate with another ship in your quadrant. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Repair. You may repair another location on the ship as if you were at that location if the check symbols match. (You may perform this action while piloting)
The only access point to the cockpit.
A welcome reprieve on a long space voyage.
{Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Scan. You may reveal another location on the ship as if you were at that location if the check symbols match. (You may perform this action while piloting)
A welcome reprieve on a long space voyage.
{Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Repair. You may repair another location on the ship as if you were at that location if the check symbols match.
